website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of push-style choppers but are leery of breakable choppers, consider this durable stainless steel model.
pros: Doesn't require too much pressure to cut
cons: Tedious to clean, and you still have to precut larger vegetables into pieces that will fit

customer_reviews.title: Like a Rolls Royce as long as nothing breaks
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously expensive. Also hands down the best chopper I've seen. It is very well designed, is extremely easy to use, and clean up is a snap. UPDATE, ABOUT A YEAR AND HALF LATER: one of the tabs (single one) broke. Ordered a very expensive replacement. It came from England so it took took awhile to get here. Same tab is cast too short and won"t stay seated. Too much trouble to wait for another replacement. Back to Walmart for another onion chopper. Tossed this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Goller

customer_reviews.title: Best performance, used all three blades
customer_reviews.text: Best performance, used all three blades, cut potatoes, tomatoes, garlic and several other vegetables. Awesome precision, powerful blades. In the picture: large blades used for tomatoes, medium for onions and small for garlic. Stainless steel finish looks great on the kitchen platform.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! Easy to clean and use! All parts detachable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my mom-in-law. It arrived in 12 hours! We wanted something that didn't require too much pressure when pushing down and that's easy to use. This product really met the expectations. It was heavier than expected which is good because you don't have to push it down as hard. It is still better to make quarters of the vegetable before putting it in to avoid pressing down too hard but it is top notch quality and all the parts are detachable and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Bad Qulaity - Stay away. It scrapes the plastic off the top.
customer_reviews.text: With the big blade its an amazing product but when it comes to the smaller ones it is the worst. Good that we noticed the second time that it had pieces of plastic along with the food that it cust we had to thow away the food as well as the product. so Beware..
customer_reviews.author: Sathyanarayanan KR

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and sturdy looking but it starts to break quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of dicers that I decided to buy a very expensive one. It worked wonderful, but then after two months ofuse the knives became dull, and they replacement knives are super expensive. The teeth on the micro dicer (used for garlic) started to break after 7 uses. The body of the dicer is strong but its knives and grates are not. I expected better from such an expensive / overpriced product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Peter

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I liked a similar but less expensive version very much. I thought the stainless steel would be an upgrade. The box for catching the chopped item is not very big. The whole thing is hard to put together. It chops well, but I really liked the large container for collecting the vegetables better. I am going to keep this, but I bought another of the Vidalia Chop Wizard because I think it is a lot easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So I loved my old chopper which is no longer made (and ...
customer_reviews.text: So I loved my old chopper which is no longer made (and I couldn't find it anywhere). The reviews were great, so I bought it. All-in-all, it's ok, but not as good as my under $20 plastic chopper that I purchased from Costco, used for years and loved. It might be the best out there, but far from perfect after spending $119.
customer_reviews.author: Bryankd

customer_reviews.title: It chopps.
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this for french fries, you will be disappointed. If you cut the potato in half it will do OK. A whole potato is too much for the cutter, the way it is designed. It is a dream to throw it in the dish washer to clean. I have not tried it on anything else but potatoes, but with the sharp blades I would guess it would do fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Howton

customer_reviews.title: Durable, strong, sharp, easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT chopper. It's very well made, very strong and fast chopping vegetables, especially onions. I bought others that broke fast because they had plastic parts. This is made of stainless steel, which makes it very durable. It's very sharp. It's a little pricey but it's a good investment. It will last longer. Easy to use, easy to clean. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela De Hasty

customer_reviews.title: Great chopper and customer serviec
customer_reviews.text: I have gone thru many choppers preparing food as a wildlife rehabilitator for hundreds of animals. The plastic ones have not fared well and when I saw this one made of stainless steel I had hope. I got it fast and my assistance were thrilled to use it. We did have one issue with a support leg weld breaking but the Case Elegance Customer Experience Team were great and quickly replaced it. I definitely recommend this chopper and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Craftkween

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, I can't believe they charge so much. My first time using it was great it minced garlic with ease, but then right after I tried to mince some thinly sliced ginger and I heard a crunch I opened up the device didn't see anything so tried again and heard the crunch. I opened it up and saw the problem was that the blades were cutting in to the plastic teeth both shaving the teeth and crushing them at the same time. I've gotten numerous cheaper vejetable choppers before and have never seen an issue like this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy , sharp blades
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy, has sharp blades which makes chopping easy. Clean up is fairly easy ,but be careful - the blades are sharp. I ordered this hoping it would make cutting vegetables, onions, tomatoes, for salads easier, faster. It does cut well, but I wish it came with more cutting blade options , considering the price. The cutting blade options are limited, but if you’re looking for a tool that just chops, and doesn’t slice, you found the right tool. Unfortunately, it didn’t suit my needs, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I'll give it a 5 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: While the ss base will probably last forever, I was disappointed in the flimsiness of the plastic reservoir. I'm sure the ears will be broken within a few months time. It's also very inconvenient to empty from the top. While I've used several different choppers and know the basics, the manual is sorely lacking for those who have never used one. The blades are beyond sharp so be very careful!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen r gronewald

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and does a great of chopping. But it is impossible to clean and they include zero cleaning utensils. I used the garlic attachment and small pieces of garlic got trapped in between the small grooves. I must have spent 15 minutes trying to get the attachment cleaned. What was supposed to be a time saver turns out to be a time waster with the cleaning issue. Also the chopper arrived without an instruction manual so I had to search online for a manual in order to learn how to use it. A frustrating experience.
customer_reviews.author: RG Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chopper! I use it every day in my kitchen! My veggie pieces are uniform which improves the taste and consistency of my dishes! Cleaning is a breeze due to special plastic insert and due to the removable blades. I can clean my chopper in a dishwasher without worrying about dulling the blades. It’s so sturdy, I can easily chop half the onion. Also, love that it comes with three interchangeable blades, which gives me more flexibility and options in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Elapan

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I do not like it. Hard to use and clean. I paid a premium for this. Friends have them made of plastic that work better. Tray is to small.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: Going to save me a lot of time!
customer_reviews.text: (This is Phil's wife) This is my first time to use a chopper of this style..going to take a little getting used to. I make 1-2 quarts of pico de gallo, and prep lots of other veggies for soups, salads and curries each week. Having used it on potatoes and mushrooms already.. it's very efficient and easy clean up. I'm glad I splurged on the stainless version, it feels very solid and I anticipate getting lots of use out of it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phil T.

customer_reviews.title: I love this alligator once you have got your vegetables ready ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this alligator once you have got your vegetables ready to chop it is a breeze I got my daughter one for Christmas rather for her birthday not Christmas and I just talked to her and she said she loves it to death
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice sturdy chopper
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is the holding bin on top....it's not that easy to get on and it doesn't stay on you have to hold it while chopping. Not a real big deal I can hold it while coming down to chop...so not a big problem just a glitch...but now when done chopping ....can't get the holding bin OFF...and everything fell all over the counter...ugh
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I contemplated spending the higher price for this item as compared to other similar items and in the end I decided to try it and I'm glad I did!. Works beautifully and cuts my prep time down immeasurably. Easy to clean up- literally seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Martin

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I hate chopping vegetables and am OCD so I like it when the vegetables are all the same size. This is great for that. It still requires a bit of pre-chopping so the vegetables have the right thickness. Also with hard vegetables like carrots it requires a lot of force. The stainless steel version is much sturdier than other plastic models.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Need to be strong
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed with this item. I have limited use of my right arm and found it nearly impossible yo use, it requires far more arm strength than i have, sadly I would not buy this again or recommend to seniors without really good arm and upper body strength. Even with help we had trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, most versatile and most effective vegetable chopper I have owned. Heavy, sturdy, very high-quality, and a breeze to use. Entirely worth its price—every home should have one. I wish it had some kind of storage for the spare blades, but it is only a minor inconvenience. Also, the blades are extremely sharp (a good thing), so be careful when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: AVWS

customer_reviews.title: Like is said in the description the Alligator will be ...
customer_reviews.text: Like is said in the description the Alligator will be the last dicer I purchase. Would love the option of larger dices. Is well designed and constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Eydie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had a quite good review of this product when I bought it first but unfortunately I have to revise it. I started to see black plastic inside my diced onions. It looks like that somehow the blades shave of the plastic underneath it. Very disappointing. Will include an image
customer_reviews.author: Arezo s.

customer_reviews.title: Short moment arm actually it's quite short but you can double it by adding your own
customer_reviews.text: Good: steel structure Bad: plastic cutting surfaces Ugly: small moment arm I recommend putting a lever on it that will make it easier to use, give me a lever large enough and I'll move the Earth itself !
customer_reviews.author: MITSCIENTIST

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it until you want to show your muscle power
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the make .. it is very hard to cut vegetables like carrot or beet root wheee you need to gift more pressure to cut them ..
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This chopper is great! I had a plastic one that was similar for several years and when it broke I was not happy because I use it often. When I saw this was stainless steel I knew I needed it because I wouldn’t have to worry about it breaking. I used it today and am very happy with it. The price is comparable to others online and I bought it anyway but I believe they should sell it cheaper. To me the price is too high. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Online Videos
customer_reviews.text: I was able to see it being used online which helped a lot when I first started using it. I have used it often and like the professional look of the diced onions. It is easy to clean but sometimes pieces of onion get stuck and have to be pushed out. I put all the pieces in a quart zip bag and then put that in the collector box with the 2 main stainless chopper pieces side by side standing up so it stores in an over-the-counter cabinet pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: At Home Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I prepare all foods to be chopped, and then do all chopping
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my kitchen equipment! I use it for uniformity of vegetables: salads, garniture. It easily cuts all vegetables into squares, julienne. I prep all vegetables to be used and then run them through the chopper: Follow instructions for easy preparation and cleaning. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like butter, cleans like a dream.
customer_reviews.text: Love this veggie chopper!! I had a chopper from WS that broke, then had been discontinued. I was bummed to have to find a new one and the pickings were slim. Then I found, and bought, the alligator. I’ve only used it a few times but so far it’s fantastic. Cuts like butter. Cleans even easier. Confidently recommend this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Deb389

customer_reviews.title: Wow works great
customer_reviews.text: I chopped up 5 large bags of onions for my neighbor and it was a walk in the park with my Alligator Chopper. I would recommend this product to anyone. Thank you seller.
customer_reviews.author: Hntingisfun

customer_reviews.title: Amount have for your kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this kitchen tool. Wishes she had it sooner. Well made, very sturdy & makes an easy job out of mincing & dicing. Great time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hladek

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need we make dog food every week dice 31/2 lbs of sweet potatoes I slice them into medallions machine does the rest sweet potatoes destroyed the automatic chopper head on the kitchen aid mixer
customer_reviews.author: jame m davis

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Rust after 1 wash. Plastic broke after 2 nd use
customer_reviews.author: William Sirois

customer_reviews.title: Makes eating healthy a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: Chopping veggies, especially onions, is 10 times faster with this. So I'm eating more veggies now. Really easy to clean too, I just rinse it under the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Ski

customer_reviews.title: You'll Never Need Another One
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my daughters for Christmas. They are totally amazing!!!!! We have used the plastic version but they keep breaking. This one will never break. Now I've got to order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brindley

customer_reviews.title: Steel is always better than plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a real chef's tool, not a gadget. STEEL, baby! Chop-chop, Done, eat your pretty salad. Such a relief to get something delivered, open the box, AND HAVE THE THING WORK! Smile, smile, smile! Jan Browne, Largo FL
customer_reviews.author: Jan Browne

customer_reviews.title: Love this - worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my old plastic/steel Alligator Chopper. This one was really pricey, but is well worth the money if you do a lot of cooking. It is super sturdy, and all of the pieces come apart for easy washing. It has different size cutters, and the "food catcher" on top is very convenient. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Used it once and cleaned it once both times severe cuts
customer_reviews.text: I used and cleaned this product and both times cut my fingers bad. Very hard to clean without cutting yourself. Unfortunately, I waited too long to try the product and the return window was gone. I am going to try to see if they will still let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery reader

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use. Safety features too.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and love the sizes of blades. Easy to change sizes and locks blades in place for safety. Breaks down easily for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kitterman

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this tool. Nice and sharp does a great job, makes easy work of dicing. Be care when cleaning. Trying to clean the dicing attachment he cut himself. Otherwise I would have given all 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: james lazelle

customer_reviews.title: false advertizing
customer_reviews.text: I watched the video before I purchased the product and it did not come with all the attachments the video showed. was disappointed and it wasn't worth 129.00
customer_reviews.author: Lee S.

customer_reviews.title: It is solid and durable.
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel body of this equipment gives you peace of mind that you won't break it just like that. its clean and shine look and easy to clean feature inspires you to use it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Samir R Desai

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. I’ve purchased many products and never write reviews. Unless I’m that dissatisfied. My $20 chopper from bed bath and beyond is a 1000x better. Worst experience I’ve had
customer_reviews.author: RK SMOOTH

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen game changer
customer_reviews.text: It’s a game changer for kitchen preparation wish I would’ve got one of these years ago nice simple engineering and easy and quick to clean I went with the stainless steel version will probably last lifetime and then some.
customer_reviews.author: jsmith8680

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the sturdiest chopper. Above and beyond the product being outstanding, their customer service team is absolutely amazing. Super responsive and so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I hoped more for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It's not as advertise "easy to use" and for the price I sure expect more.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriria Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chopper
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vegetable chopper I've ever owned. It's expensive but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. VanderMolen

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHOPPER EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chopper is very sturdy and easy to clean. I would recommend this chopper to anyone looking for a great chopper!
customer_reviews.author: M. V

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting used to my alligator. Over time I think I will find many uses.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Wow this is a well-built shopper you’ll probably pass down to your kids
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a well-built shopper you’ll probably pass down to your kids just be careful when cleaning and a lot of finger cuts
customer_reviews.author: Randall Wathen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Seriously sharp. Cuts veggies like buttah! Awesome for my bibimbop cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth Martin

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought before the genius one and the second time that I used broke. This one is amazingly sharp, the stainless steel is heavy duty is a great tool for someone like me that cook every day from scratch. I love and I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my plastic chopper with this stainless and wow, what a difference! The blades are incredibly sharp, and little effort is needed to press through veggies. I know it won't crack and break like the plastic one, so I expect to have it many years. Saves me much time in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: circ55

customer_reviews.title: Weak receptacle
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built except the receptacle appears like it won’t last as it attaches by small plastic tabs. Small capacity, and it receives chopped pieces from below which is a bit awkward. So far it works well for chopping various vegetables but I feel like I need to be careful not to break the receptacle
customer_reviews.author: KN479

customer_reviews.title: Realy nice
customer_reviews.text: I've had almost all the choppers this ones the best
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I have used less costly products which was made in plastic. They didnt last. This Alligator Chopper is not going to break down anytime soon.'
customer_reviews.author: Henry Park

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality chopper!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely amazing! Don’t be put off by the price, this chopper feels like it’ll last a lifetime. The plastic choppers feel like they’ll break at some point, but not this bad boy. Would definitely buy again, but don’t think I’ll need to!
customer_reviews.author: Anthoney Scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Almost the best chopper
customer_reviews.text: Well made but the plastic bin is cheap and is too small. For the money it could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handiest Small Appliance
customer_reviews.text: I just love this item. So easy to quickly chop vegetables. Everything is uniform. Can chop a whole bunch of celery in no time. Expensive, but I've found it worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dicer/chopper!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! It's easy to clean as long as you do it right away. My two and a half year old grandson helped me chop and dice 10 lbs of onions. It took longer to peel the onions then it did to chop/ dice them.
customer_reviews.author: ErmeLinda

customer_reviews.title: Súper!
customer_reviews.text: Love to do my Russian salads with it!!!3 times faster than cutting vegetables normal way!!!
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Use the clean up grids
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been great for dicing onions, cucumbers, even olives. It is best to use the clean up grids, while it won't eliminate the need for cleaning, it sure makes a difference. Blades are sharp. Very happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No More Broken Choppers
customer_reviews.text: After going thru 5 plastic choppers that always broke when you most needed them. I purchase the Alligator for both home and our Elks lodge. When I add up the cost of worthless plastic choppers, it more than pays to purchase a Alligator. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Conway

customer_reviews.title: Need instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Am anxious to use, however no instructions were included when delivered. Please send instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Richbourg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and super effective. My only issue is the cleaning, I don't let the food dry in but there is always tiny pieces stuck...
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I have had 6 plastic chopper and all of them broke. This chopper is GREAT. I do not think it can break at all. Metal all around and plastic that holds the blades but again I do not think any of the parts will break. Amy K
customer_reviews.author: amy k

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We grow all our vegetables, freeze tons. Having an easy and fast way to chop them is so wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Zellner

customer_reviews.title: Missing user manual and blade
customer_reviews.text: Open the box and I was missing the user manual and one of the inserts. Very disappointed. Very expensive product and I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have this chopper
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased every chopping device on the market. Electric and manual. This is the one right here. I chop any and everything with ease. Makes my meals look so professional.
customer_reviews.author: Julia F.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific tool
customer_reviews.text: Already had one I use, now got one for our Senior Center. This is the best tool for chopping onions, potatoes, tomatoes, etc. use every day and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra riley

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through two of these in plastic which did not hold up very long before breaking. I have full confidence that this item will last a very long time. It was worth the investment. I LOVE this chopper.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Too many parts
customer_reviews.text: By the time you put together all the parts to do the job you could much more easily have used a knife. Big waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - light years ahead of the plastic ones we had used previously!
customer_reviews.author: JamesSt.

customer_reviews.title: The only chopper that really works so far
customer_reviews.text: I tried many choppers and this is the only one that cuts without problems vegetables like onion (it was the main reason why I bought it). The blades are sharp and the equipment is heavy (steel body) and that facilitates its use.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: There was not a dislike about this chopper! Sturdy and effective. I have recommended to friends
customer_reviews.author: KATE

customer_reviews.title: Cant live without it!
customer_reviews.text: Its the first chopper ive had that is sturdy, sharp and trustworthy. It cleans very easily. One improvememt is to make the clear plastic storage bin as long as the chopper.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri C.

customer_reviews.title: I love it, so I purchased this one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these, I love it, so I purchased this one for my daughter for Christmas. I had the old plastic one and it was junk. This new stronger material will chop almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Lysek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, easy to use, exactly as shown, love the tool.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDY

customer_reviews.title: messy
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to cut something that is juicy because the way the been that holds all your cut pieces is is on top and it lets all the juices come back down-and-out you cannot cut and not make a mess
customer_reviews.author: Carol Santoro

customer_reviews.title: ALLIGATOR VEGETABLE CHOPPER GREAT APPLIANCE
customer_reviews.text: I have had several other vegetable choppers but this is the sturdiest I have ever used. I use it for chopping onion, peppers and potatoes. I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: N Davis

customer_reviews.title: Directions
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to figure out how to use the cleaners still working on all the pieces should have better directions or a video on how to use and clean it is very sharp I like it
customer_reviews.author: keith s solar

customer_reviews.title: able to withstand wear and pressure
customer_reviews.text: My family eats peppers and onions like it's our job. We have a garden and can lots of salsa. I have broken many choppers. This one seems to be durable to survive me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best onion chopper.
customer_reviews.text: Great item I also have the plastic version but which is a lot more flimsy,this is definitely the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: PHH

customer_reviews.title: i am in love!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a plastic chopper that I've had for years. It was still in good shape but it took a lot of effort to chop the food and I always felt like I was going to break it. After watching videos of the Alligator in action I was sold. It's a solidly built chopper and it takes much less effort to chop food using it than the one I had before. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: jawhite

customer_reviews.title: Great Chopper
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Only had it a couple of weeks we'll see how the plastics parts whole up. So far know problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lee74

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had a plastic chopper right up until it broke. Saved my money and bought this one. Can chopper a 2 by 4. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: way overpriced for what you get and the plastic catch container should be the lengh of the chopper. A Bit small
customer_reviews.author: Jbennett

customer_reviews.title: Very different from expectation.
customer_reviews.text: Stuff gets stuck on the toothed base. Tomato juice gets spilled over from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sturdy reliable chopper that is made well and functions well. This satisfies that requirement
customer_reviews.author: Kavita G.

customer_reviews.title: Great onion/garlic chopper
customer_reviews.text: Third chopper I have owned. Others were plastic and broke. This one will last forever!

customer_reviews.title: This is great for cubing tofu for frying - 1/2 inch size ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cubing tofu for frying - 1/2 inch size is just right for adding to recipes. Not great with sweet potato as it takes too much effort to push through even when sliced down to a manageable size. Good with garlic and onions but clean up is not as easy due to sticking in the blades and in the base - soaking helps. Generally, if I only need a few garlic cloves rough copped it's quicker by hand. I tend to use this when there's lots to chop so makes clean-up time worth it. Overall, I'm glad to have this when I need uniform dice or a lot of little stuff needs processing.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great chopper! Pricy but worth every penny for me ...
customer_reviews.text: Great chopper! Pricy but worth every penny for me since I do use it a lot. Not like the plastic choppers that kept braking on me.

product_meta.title: Alligator Vegetable Chopper Stainless Steel Construction and Sharpest Steel Blades - Professional Grade Chopper
feature_bullets: Best chopper. Period. This is the most dependable, well-constructed chopper you will ever use. Period. Clean cuts, quick and easy cleanup, solid stainless steel construction and it’s dishwasher safe.
Always sharp no more mushing foods with your old chopper. The sharp beveled ALLIGATOR blades cleanly cut through all types of food.
Durable & modern the modern stainless steel construction will not only compliment your gorgeous cooking space, but it will be the last chopper you ever have to buy.
Three blades & no mess each chopper comes equipped with three interchangeable blades to combat various food types, and the collector cleverly keeps what is chopped in one spot.
